item.title: Hosted VoIP Can Improve Telephone Reliability
item.description:
Many businesses, even large ones, hold onto their own phone systems believing it’s the only way to guarantee reliable communication. But is this true, or is it time to reconsider this assumption? The phone service industry has experienced a significant shift with the emergence of hosted PBX (HPBX), also called hosted VoIP or cloud communications. Like other cloud-based technologies, this is a game-changer. In the future, we’ll wonder why we didn’t switch sooner...
